column4: is there a reason for ubuntu linux-source-2.6.17 be different from current linux-image-2.6.17???
the source appears to be 2.6.17.14 and the binary is 2.6.17.10
yes... security patches and overstressed and/or lazy maintainers :-)
damn it. i have to build the whole kernel just to be able to build my webcam module
